speaker.whotheyare: Betsy Kauffman helps leaders create innovative, aligned, disruptive agile organizations.
speaker.whylisten: For the past 20 years, Betsy Kauffman has worked side by side with hundreds of leaders and has seen just about every variation of how leadership teams operate and execute, both successfully and not so successfully. She started her own coaching and consulting firm, Cross Impact Coaching. Her superpowers include the ability to see, name and discuss the "elephants in the room" while empathetically delivering honest and open feedback.
